name: Wimpod
description: The Turn Tail Pokémon. It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.description: When a damaging move causes this Pokémon to fall below 50% of its maximum HP, it MUST disengage and move up to its speed in a straight line towards its trainer as a free action. If this would put the Pokémon in range of switching out, it must do so as another free action if another Pokémon is available to replace it.
